column1: NY has always been hostile to small businesses and COVID-19 has worsened that burden.   Its time to eliminate burdensome policies that hold them back and pass policies that will unleash the power of New York’s private sector - thats what I'm fighting for https://t.co/0bX8aG94q8
.@secpompeo is right. China lied and covered up COVID-19 and they must be held accountable https://t.co/Dmufktpj3T

Cuomo is lying to us again. He’s refusing to tell us how many New Yorkers died as a result of his order forcing COVID positive patients into nursing homes. Now he's having his Health Commissioner do his dirty work. Even Democrats aren't buying these lies https://t.co/6dkB6ysi7m

Great to tour NOYES Hospital in Dansville yesterday. As we weather the COVID-19 crisis it's crucial we ensure our rural hospitals have the resources needed to deliver quality care.   I look forward to working with our local healthcare professionals to ensure their needs are met https://t.co/8vJAAHsDJ4

Excellent news today! The US economy is returning and Americans are getting back to work all around the Nation. @realdonaldtrump has lead the nation through the COVID-19 crisis well and now we can all look forward to a strong recovery  https://t.co/i2etiob2yF

President @realDonaldTrump endorsed me because he knows I am ready to fight for the people of Western NY & ensure that we defeat COVID-19 & get our country back on track. We need conservative leaders in Washington to help the President & on June 23rd we can ensure he gets one. https://t.co/8jRp9xxpEl

When I get to Congress in June I will immediately join @EliseStefanik and my NY GOP colleagues to ensure a thorough federal investigation is launched into Gov. Cuomo’s deadly decision to force COVID-19 patients into nursing homes https://t.co/cJuh0HoO19

Happening today - the 914th Air Refueling Wing and 158th Fighter Wing will be doing a flyover to honor all the heroes on the frontlines fighting everyday to defeat COVID-19. Make sure to check the time they will be in your area so you can participate in this event! https://t.co/FiJGi6aI1m

Please join me in praying for all those on the front lines of this COVID battle from our health care workers to our farmers. As well we pray for our president @realDonaldTrump and all those in leadership roles as they keep us safe while getting our country working again. https://t.co/0BjliEdCTg

.@GOPAC is dedicated to electing strong Republican leaders & Im honored to join their team of endorsed candidates! I’ll fight for WNY in Congress & I plan to work with our President to defeat COVID-19 rebuild our economy & get our country back on track https://t.co/qyg4Ahh6ik

Please watch this wonderful video highlighting that our farmers are also on the "frontlines" of this Covid battle. Thank you to our farmers and all those in the agriculture sector for all that you do https://t.co/uKhsJr5MqA

Do you have a friend or family member who is concerned about voting in person on June 23rd due to COVID? We are here to help! Share or fill out the form below and we’ll send you a absentee ballot application. Don't let the virus violate your right to vote! https://t.co/64DlN6UzCh
Great opportunity tonight at 7 PM for an update from the New York Congressional Delegation on response efforts to #COVID19 For more information visit: https://t.co/vCpNyWU5Um

China continues to spread disinformation about their failed response to the #coronavirus & threaten anyone who dares speak the truth. We need leaders in Congress who will work with @realDonaldTrump to hold China accountable. https://t.co/buBsODBRbD

China continues to be an aggressor on the world stage. Their continued efforts to cover up COVID-19 & avoid accountability have endangered the world & are an insult to all those effected. China is a threat to global security and must be treated that way  https://t.co/4avSgPE3vA
Attention! Due to Coronavirus all voters can vote by mail for the June 23rd election. Visit https://t.co/64DlN6CYdH to request an absentee ballot application now! https://t.co/UZebf1QEHg

Our healthcare workers are on the front lines fighting to keep us safe and healthy during the Coronavirus pandemic. As a small token of gratitude Our campaign team dropped off Easter dinner to the staff at Eastern Niagara Hospital in Lockport. Thank you for all you do! https://t.co/uywX9eHGt6

I visited Catholic Heath headquarters today to deliver several hundred masks to their dedicated team of healthcare workers. The healthcare workers across WNY WORK tirelessly to care for those affected by COVID-19 and are deserving of all of our appreciation and thanks. https://t.co/NKGpeCgKgZ

Today on #WorldHealthDay  we extend our deepest gratitude for all the doctors nurses and healthcare professionals on the frontlines fighting COVID-19. Their dedication and tireless work will get us through this challenge https://t.co/d0Vn46HH0W

For far too long China has lied and put the rest of the world in jeopardy for its own selfish purposes. I applaud Rep. Stefanik for this legislation that would punish China for lying about COVID-19 and endangering the world https://t.co/pVvWSZh8s8

Last Saturday I held a virtual roundtable with farmers in Western NY to talk about how #COVID19 is impacting local agriculture. I'll continue to stay in contact with our famers and ensure we are doing everything we can to support them. https://t.co/QHdlRLPGuF
If you have medical or protection supplies and are willing to donate to help hospitals and healthcare professionals in New York State please email covid19supplies@esd.ny.gov or call 212.803.3100

Important info for voters in NY-27: The date for our special election has changed from April 28th to June 23rd due to the coronavirus. While the date has changed the importance of winning this race has not. @realDonaldTrump and I are counting on your support on June 23rd. https://t.co/hqBBBcBYlM

As someone who’s father was a Doctor who dedicated his career to helping his patients - this day holds special meaning. As our brave doctors fight to end the COVID-19 crisis take a moment to reach out and thank them for their service on this day. We are all eternally grateful https://t.co/KiLHoaGKXt

Saturday I held a virtual town hall with farmers to discuss the impact of COVID-19 on agriculture in WNY. Our farmers are extremely important to keeping healthy food on our tables & I plan to do everything I can to help them prosper in Congress https://t.co/kNVo52U4S2
